original: @87b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @87b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: n'a ma sam g'i ti s'a dha nam /
analyzed: n'a ma sam g'i ti s'a dha nam /
translated: Nāmasamgīti-sādhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The Means of Achievement Called the Praise in Verse of the Names [of Mañjuśrī]

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to youthful Mañjuśrī.

original: re zhig dang por sgrub pa po snga bar langs te /
analyzed: re zhig dang por sgrub pa po snga bar langs te /
translated: First, the practitioner should rise early,

original: gdong la sogs pa dag par byas te /
analyzed: gdong la sogs pa dag par byas te /
translated: and having purified his face and so forth,

original: sgom pa'i khang par zhugs te /
analyzed: sgom pa'i khang par zhugs te /
translated: he should enter the meditation hut,

original: bde ba'i stan la skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste /
analyzed: bde ba'i stan la skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste /
translated: and sitting on a comfortable seat with his legs crossed,

original: rang gi snying gar zla ba dang padma la mu:yig dmar ser bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi snying gar zla ba dang padma la mu:yig dmar ser bsgom par bya'o //
translated: he should meditate on a red-orange muḥ syllable on a moon and lotus in his heart.

original: de nas de'i 'od zer gyi phung po lcags kyu'i rnam pas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i bcom ldan 'das kha dog dang zhal dang phyag dang gdan dang bcas pa bkug ste /
analyzed: de nas de'i 'od zer gyi phung po lcags kyu'i rnam pas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i bcom ldan 'das kha dog dang zhal dang phyag dang gdan dang bcas pa bkug ste /
translated: Then, with a mass of light rays from that in the form of hooks, he should summon the Blessed One with his color, faces, hands, and seat as will be explained,

original: mdun du bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: mdun du bsam par bya'o //
translated: and imagine him in front.

original: de la yid la bya ba'i me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
analyzed: de la yid la bya ba'i me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
translated: There, having made offerings with mental flowers, incense, and so forth,

original: mdun du sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa thams cad bya ste /
analyzed: mdun du sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa thams cad bya ste /
translated: In front of oneself, one should perform all the rites of confession of sins and so forth.

original: byams pa la sogs pa tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par byas la /🔽chos thams cad @88a * //
analyzed: byams pa la sogs pa tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par byas la / chos thams cad @88a * //
translated: One should cultivate the four divine abodes of love and so forth.🔽One should realize the emptiness of all phenomena

original: stong pa nyid mngon du byas te sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid mngon du byas te sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: and consecrate with this mantra:

original: aom sh'un+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
analyzed: aom sh'un+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
translated: Oṃ śūnyatā jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ.

original: de nas nam mkha' la h'um yig las rdo rje rtse lnga pa sa bon dang bcas pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas nam mkha' la h'um yig las rdo rje rtse lnga pa sa bon dang bcas pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then, in space, one should visualize a five-pronged vajra with its seed syllable hūṃ.

original: de'i steng du aa yig la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /🔽de'i 'od zer rnams kyis rdo rje'i ra ba dang / rdo rje'i gur dang / rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyis gzhi gser gyis gzhi la thug pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du aa yig la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor / de'i 'od zer rnams kyis rdo rje'i ra ba dang / rdo rje'i gur dang / rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyis gzhi gser gyis gzhi la thug pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Above that, one should visualize an a syllable with a moon maṇḍala.🔽One should visualize that its light rays form a vajra fence, a vajra pavilion, and a golden ground that reaches to the vajra nature.

original: rdo rje yang 'od zer du gyur nas rdo rje ra ba'i phyir ngos su phyogs bcings pa la sogs pa'i gzugs su gnas par blta'o //
analyzed: rdo rje yang 'od zer du gyur nas rdo rje ra ba'i phyir ngos su phyogs bcings pa la sogs pa'i gzugs su gnas par blta'o //
translated: The vajra also becomes light rays, and one should see it as abiding in the form of the enclosure of the vajra fence and so forth.

original: de'i rjes la rdo rje ra ba'i nang du hr'i:yig las padma de'i steng du aa yig las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
analyzed: de'i rjes la rdo rje ra ba'i nang du hr'i:yig las padma de'i steng du aa yig las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
translated: After that, within the vajra fence, from the syllable hriḥ appears a lotus, and upon that, from the syllable a, a moon maṇḍala.

original: de'i steng du mu:yig dmar ser sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa spro ba dang bsdu ba byed par bsams la /
analyzed: de'i steng du mu:yig dmar ser sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa spro ba dang bsdu ba byed par bsams la /
translated: Upon that, from the reddish-yellow syllable muḥ, imagine that it radiates and reabsorbs immeasurable buddhas.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las rje btsun 'jam dpal dmar ser padma dang zla ba'i steng du rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las rje btsun 'jam dpal dmar ser padma dang zla ba'i steng du rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
translated: From that transformation, the venerable Mañjuśrī is reddish-yellow, sitting on a lotus and moon in the vajra posture.

original: shes rab kyi pu sti dang ral gri dang gzhu dang mda' 'dzin pa rin po che'i dbu rgyan can /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pu sti dang ral gri dang gzhu dang mda' 'dzin pa rin po che'i dbu rgyan can /
translated: He holds a wisdom text, a sword, a bow, and an arrow, and is adorned with a crown of jewels.

original: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyang cus brgyan pa /
analyzed: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyang cus brgyan pa /
translated: He is adorned with the thirty-two marks and the eighty adornments of a great being.

original: gzhon pa gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan par bdag nyid bsam mo //
analyzed: gzhon pa gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan par bdag nyid bsam mo //
translated: He is youthful, adorned with the ornaments of youth.

original: snying gar padma dang zla ba'i steng du sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'i rdo rje sems ma dkar mo g-yon pas dril bu dkur brten pa /
analyzed: snying gar padma dang zla ba'i steng du sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'i rdo rje sems ma dkar mo g-yon pas dril bu dkur brten pa /
translated: In his heart, on a lotus and moon, is white Vajrasattva, sitting in the bodhisattva posture, with a bell held to the hip with the left hand.

original: g-yas pas snying gar bstod pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas pas snying gar bstod pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The right hand holds a vajra at the heart in the manner of praise.

original: dpral bar de bzhin du yang dag par gnas pa'i rin chen rdo rje sems ma ser mo phyag gnyis kyis spyi bro me tog gi phreng ba 'ching ba'o //
analyzed: dpral bar de bzhin du yang dag par gnas pa'i rin chen rdo rje sems ma ser mo phyag gnyis kyis spyi bro me tog gi phreng ba 'ching ba'o //
translated: On the forehead, in the same way, is yellow Ratnaratnavajriṇī, with two hands holding a jewel at the forehead in the manner of binding a flower garland.

original: mgrin par padma'i rdo rje ma dmar ser g-yon 'gying ba gi tshul gyis padma'i rtsa ba 'dzin pa /
analyzed: mgrin par padma'i rdo rje ma dmar ser g-yon 'gying ba gi tshul gyis padma'i rtsa ba 'dzin pa /
translated: At the throat is yellow Padmaratnavajriṇī, holding a lotus root with a gesture of graceful swaying to the left.

original: g-yas kyis de'i 'dab ma 'byed pa sngar bzhin du gnas par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: g-yas kyis de'i 'dab ma 'byed pa sngar bzhin du gnas par blta bar bya'o //
translated: The right hand opens its petals, as before.

original: spyi bor las kyi rdo rje ma ljang gu rdo rje rtse gsum lag pa gnyis kyis spyi bor 'dzin pa /
analyzed: spyi bor las kyi rdo rje ma ljang gu rdo rje rtse gsum lag pa gnyis kyis spyi bor 'dzin pa /
translated: On the crown of the head is green Karmavajriṇī, holding a three-pronged vajra at the crown with two hands.

original: de bzhin du yang dag par bsgom par bya'o ;🔽/ aom badzra aam ku sha dza:/
analyzed: de bzhin du yang dag par bsgom par bya'o ; / aom badzra aam ku sha dza:/
translated: One should visualize her in the same way.🔽oṃ vajra aṅkuśa jaḥ

original: aom badzra p'a sha h'um /🔽aom badzra spho ta bam /
analyzed: aom badzra p'a sha h'um / aom badzra spho ta bam /
translated: oṃ vajra pāśa hūṃ🔽oṃ vajra sphoṭa vaṃ

original: aom bdzra a'a be sha ho:/
analyzed: aom bdzra a'a be sha ho:/
translated: oṃ vajra āveśa hoḥ

original: zhes bya ba 'di rnams kyi sngags kyis padma dang zla ba'i steng du go rims bzhin du ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di rnams kyi sngags kyis padma dang zla ba'i steng du go rims bzhin du ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas te /
translated: With these mantras, on a lotus and moon, one should summon, induct, bind, and control the nine maṇḍalas of pristine consciousness, in order.

original: rdo rje khu tshur @88b ba cangs te mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis lcags sgrog tu byas te /
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur @88b ba cangs te mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis lcags sgrog tu byas te /
translated: Forming the vajra fist, with the index and small fingers locked,

original: rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya sprad pa gan rgyal du byas pas rang gi snying gar bzhag pas yon chab dang // zhal bsil dang / me tog dang spos la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la /
analyzed: rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya sprad pa gan rgyal du byas pas rang gi snying gar bzhag pas yon chab dang // zhal bsil dang / me tog dang spos la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la /
translated: the vajra wheel mudra is placed on one’s heart, face down, and one should make offerings with water for the feet, water for the mouth, flowers, incense, and so on.

original: de ma thag tu rang gi lus la gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: de ma thag tu rang gi lus la gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Immediately afterward, one should induct them into one’s body.

original: de'i rjes la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba sngon du song bas bdag nyid kyi spyi bor mi bskyod pa bsams la /
analyzed: de'i rjes la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba sngon du song bas bdag nyid kyi spyi bor mi bskyod pa bsams la /
translated: After that, having been previously empowered by all tathāgatas, Akṣobhya is visualized on one’s crown.

original: aom sarbba dharmma aa bh'a ba sva bh'a ba bi shuddha bdzra aa a'a aam aa:/
analyzed: aom sarbba dharmma aa bh'a ba sva bh'a ba bi shuddha bdzra aa a'a aam aa:/
translated: oṃ sarva dharma-abhāva svabhāva viśuddha-vajra a ā aḥ aṃ aḥ

original: pra kri ti ba ri shuddha sarba dharmm'a ya du ta sarba ta th'a ga ta dzny'a na k'a ya manydzu shr'i pa ri shuddhi t'a mu p'a d'a ye ti aa a'a:/
analyzed: pra kri ti ba ri shuddha sarba dharmm'a ya du ta sarba ta th'a ga ta dzny'a na k'a ya manydzu shr'i pa ri shuddhi t'a mu p'a d'a ye ti aa a'a:/
translated: prakritipariśuddhaḥ sarvadharmā yathāruta sarvatathāgatajñāna- kāyavajrapariśuddhitām upādāya a āḥ.

original: sarba ta th'a ga t'a hri da ya /
analyzed: sarba ta th'a ga t'a hri da ya /
translated: sarvatathāgatāḥ hṛdaya

original: ha ra ha ra /
analyzed: ha ra ha ra /
translated: hara hara

original: aom h'um hr'i: bha ga b'a na dzny'a na m'u rti b'a g'i shva ra ma h'a wa tsa sarba dharmm'a ga ga na aa ma la su pa ri shuddha dharmma dh'a tu dzny'a na ga rbha a'a:/
analyzed: aom h'um hr'i: bha ga b'a na dzny'a na m'u rti b'a g'i shva ra ma h'a wa tsa sarba dharmm'a ga ga na aa ma la su pa ri shuddha dharmma dh'a tu dzny'a na ga rbha a'a:/
translated: oṃ hūṃ hrīḥ bhagavān jñānamūrti bāgīśvara mahāvaca sarvadharmā gaganāmalasupariśuddha- dharmadhātujñānagarbha āḥ.

original: zhes pa'i snags 'dis dang po dang tha ma dang dbus su byin gyis brlab pa sngon du song bas /
analyzed: zhes pa'i snags 'dis dang po dang tha ma dang dbus su byin gyis brlab pa sngon du song bas /
translated: Having first consecrated with this mantra at the beginning, end, and in the middle,

original: rje btsun yang dag par brjod pa rtag tu thun mtshams su lan gsum mam du ma yang rung /
analyzed: rje btsun yang dag par brjod pa rtag tu thun mtshams su lan gsum mam du ma yang rung /
translated: the venerable one should always recite it at the end of the session, three or more times.

original: rdo rje'i skyil mo krung bcas te mnyam par gzhag pas bklag par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i skyil mo krung bcas te mnyam par gzhag pas bklag par bya'o //
translated: Seated in the vajra posture, one should read it in equipoise.

original: 'di ji srid du bklags pa de srid du grub pa'i mtshan ma rnams mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ji srid du bklags pa de srid du grub pa'i mtshan ma rnams mthong ngo //
translated: For as long as one reads this, for that long one will see the signs of accomplishment.

original: de lta bas na sgrub thabs nyams su blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na sgrub thabs nyams su blang bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should practice the means of accomplishment.

original: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
analyzed: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
translated: The means of accomplishment of the Praise in Honor of One Worthy of Honor is complete.

original: // / dar ma grags kyis rang 'gyur byas //
analyzed: // / dar ma grags kyis rang 'gyur byas //
translated: It was translated by Dharmakīrti himself.

original: de yis bsod nams gang thob des //🔽chos dbyings ngag gi dbang phyug gis //
analyzed: de yis bsod nams gang thob des // chos dbyings ngag gi dbang phyug gis //
translated: Whatever merit I have gained by this,🔽May it be a blessing to all beings

original: 'gro ba byin gyis brlab par shog //
analyzed: 'gro ba byin gyis brlab par shog //
translated: By the power of the Dharma realm.
